selectedVerses.text: Even the beasts of the field pant for you because the water brooks are dried up, and fire has devoured the pastures of the wilderness.
A drought against her waters, that they may be dried up! For it is a land of images, and they are mad over idols.
But now our strength is dried up, and there is nothing at all but this manna to look at."
I dug wells and drank foreign waters, and I dried up with the sole of my foot all the streams of Egypt.'

In the six hundred and first year, in the first month, the first day of the month, the waters were dried from off the earth. And Noah removed the covering of the ark and looked, and behold, the face of the ground was dry.
